array: If selected, this attribute can store multiple values instead of a single value.
• A person have multiple Email address or Spoken language values
• A computer may have multiple Processor or Hard disk values
The minimum number of values that must be included in a CI for this attribute.
If the minimum is zero or not specified, no limitation is enforced.
The maximum number of values that can be specified in a CI for this attribute.
If the maximum is zero or not specified, no limitation is enforced.
required: All CIs of this type must have a valid value entered for this attribute.
type: This determines the type of information that can be stored in this attribute for CIs.
A string of text characters such as a title or short paragraph.
A mathematical number, including integers, floating point numbers, imaginary numbers, etc.
A simple boolean or bit flag representing one of two values: true or false.
Allows for nesting a group of attributes together under a single parent attribute.
name: The name of the attribute.
This name will be used to automatically generate the System name of the attribute.
E.g. Person or Document
description: • Rules for using or updating the attribute
string: The minimum number of text characters that must be entered in a CI for this attribute.
If the minimum is zero or not specified, no minimum is enforced
The maximum number of text characters that can be entered in a CI for this attribute.
If the maximum is zero or not specified, no maximum is enforced
number: The unit of measure described by this attribute
If specified, the units will be displayed as a suffix to the value of this attribute on all CIs
The minimum numeric value that must be entered in a CI for this attribute.
If the minimum is zero or not specified, no minimum is enforced
The maximum numeric value that can be entered in a CI for this attribute.
If the maximum is zero or not specified, no maximum is enforced
group: The name given to an item that represents a singular of this attribute array.
Defaults to the name of the attribute.
• For a Phone numbers attribute, singular would be Phone number
